name: sqlite-utils
summary: Python CLI utility and library for manipulating SQLite databases.

name: datasette
summary: An open source multi-tool for exploring and publishing data.

name: simple-graph
summary: A graph database in SQLite inspired by 'SQLite as a document database'.

name: sqleton
summary: A tool to visualise SQLite database schemas.

name: sqlite-parquet-vtable
summary: A SQLite virtual table extension to expose Parquet files as SQL tables.

name: SQLCipher
summary: A SQLite extension adding on-the-fly encryption, tamper detection, strong key derivation and memory sanitisation.

name: Litestream
summary: Litestream is a standalone streaming replication tool for SQLite.
